title: House GOP tries to squeeze judges over Trump frustration
shortDescription: The statement comes as Congress seeks to rein in federal judges who disagree with President Donald Trump.

title: How Trump officials spoke about Houthi strikes on Signal
shortDescription: Here's how the incident played out earlier this month, based on reporting from The Atlantic and from the wire service Reuters.

title: Democrats drill into Trump officials over Signal scandal
shortDescription: At an already scheduled hearing Tuesday, Democratic senators called the incident "mind-boggling" and "reckless," and called for an investigation.

title: Here's how Trump's team crucified Hillary Clinton for a security breach
shortDescription: Years before their Signal chat about Houthi war plans, top Trump aides said security breaches are a firing -- and prosecutable -- offense.

title: Trump says Venezuelan deportees are gang members. Evidence is thin.
shortDescription: Plus: How secrecy sits at the center of Trump's clash with courts. | Angry constituents met lawmakers at recent local town hall meetings.

title: Trump portrait removed from Colorado Capitol after president complained
shortDescription:
On Sunday, a portrait of Trump 
commissioned and hung by state Republicans six years ago drew the president's ire on social media. It was taken down.

title: Who is Mike Waltz? Trump adviser added reporter to Signal chat
shortDescription: The Atlantic's editor-in-chief Jeffrey Goldberg reported he was accidentally added by Mike Waltz to a group chat containing secret military plans.

title: Trump pick to run Social Security has not thought about privatization
shortDescription: Advocates for retirees and the disabled say privatizing the agency could result in reduced benefit payments to millions of Americans.

title: Unions sue Trump over Columbia University research cuts
shortDescription: Trump officials say they targeted Columbia University for failing to protect Jewish students during pro-Palestinian protests last year.

title: Trump aides refuse to give judge info about Venezuelan deportations
shortDescription: Three Trump Cabinet members refused to give a judge info about the Venezuelan deportations, citing national security and foreign relations concerns.

title: Trump admin scrambles as probes begin on group text security breach
shortDescription: President Trump said his national security adviser, Mike Waltz, "learned a lesson" after he opened up a secret chat of Trump officials to a reporter.

title: Trump officials shared war plans in chat that included journalist
shortDescription: Plus: Trump says countries that buy oil and gas from Venezuela must pay a 25% tariff to the U.S. | Postal workers rally over plan to dismantle USPS.

title: Trump cuts hit struggling food banks, risking hunger for low-income Americans
shortDescription: Food banks across the country say they will have less food to distribute because of at least $1 billion in federal funding cuts and pauses.

title: Trump says Greenland invited US delegation. Not true, says Greenland.
shortDescription: Greenland flatly denied a claim made by President Donald Trump that officials from the island invited a delegation led by Usha Vance, the wife of Vice President JD Vance, to visit the Arctic territory this week.

title: Nazis were treated better than Venezuelans deported by Trump, judge says
shortDescription: A U.S. appeals court judge said Nazis were given more rights to contest their removal from the U.S. than Venezuelans deported by the Trump administration.
